lead_paragraph: FOLEY--Edward Francis "Ted", age 86, of Spring Lake Heights, NJ and Jupiter, FL died April 5, 2016. Loving husband of Colleen (Haggerty Butler) Foley, the son of the late Edward F. and Genevieve (O'Neil) Foley. Born May 12, 1929, raised in Fall River, MA. Served in the US Navy, graduated from Notre Dame and had a career with the Federal Bureau of Investigation retiring as Special Agent in Charge of the New York City Criminal Division. His second career was as the V.P. of Security and later Security Consultant for the Delaware North Companies. Predeceased by his first wife Marguerite (Guilka) Foley, sisters Genevieve McNerney, Helene Hargraves and his son Stephen Foley. He is survived by his wife of 29 years, his sons Edward F. (Janet) Jr. of Arizona, William of South Carolina, Joseph (Phyllis) of New Jersey, and Edward (Jennifer) Butler of New Jersey; daughters Therese (Jarold) Smith of North Carolina, Anne (Samuel) Maiorano of New York, and Elizabeth (Daniel) Houder of New Hampshire and 10 grandchildren. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FOLEY, EDWARD FRANCIS "TED"
